description: Try our easy to follow Raspberry Tarts recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Raspberry Tarts Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Roughly crush half of the raspberries and fold through the crème patissiere. Remove pastry shells from tins and fill with crème. Top with remaining raspberries and brush with jam. Garnish with mint.
